plot: Ronald Reagan, the Republican candidate for governor of California, and Senator Robert Kennedy of New York are featured in newsreel footage and interviews from the 1966 California gubernatorial campaign.
title: Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Reagan and the Big, Beautiful, Beleaguered American Dream
plot_es: Ronald Reagan, the Republican candidate for governor of California, and Senator Robert Kennedy of New York are featured in newsreel footage and interviews from the 1966 California gubernatorial campaign.
original_name: Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Reagan and the Big, Beautiful, Beleaguered American Dream
plot_en: Ronald Reagan, the Republican candidate for governor of California, and Senator Robert Kennedy of New York are featured in newsreel footage and interviews from the 1966 California gubernatorial campaign.
